docs.lead_paragraph: Jane Heller is the author of "Confessions of a She-Fan: The Course of True Love With the New York Yankees." (Rodale)
docs.abstract: Jane Heller is the author of "Confessions of a She-Fan: The Course of True Love With the New York Yankees." (Rodale) Nero is said to have fiddled while Rome burned. I chose another diversion during last week's wildfire in Santa Barbara: I blogged about the Yankees. If that makes me sound callous and unfeeling, forgive [...]

docs.lead_paragraph: Updated, 7:02 p.m. | The federal government deposed Mayor Michael R. Bloomberg for four and a half hours on Thursday in connection with a discrimination lawsuit against the financial services and media giant he founded.

headline.main: Bloomberg Is Deposed in Discrimination Suit

docs.abstract: Mr. Bloomberg's participation represents the most significant moment yet in a class-action lawsuit on behalf of more than 80 female employees who argue that the company engaged in a pattern of discrimination against pregnant women who took maternity leave.
docs.snippet: Mr. Bloomberg's participation represents the most significant moment yet in a class-action lawsuit on behalf of more than 80 female employees who argue that the company engaged in a pattern of discrimination against pregnant women who took maternity...

docs.lead_paragraph: Unmarried mothers gave birth to 4 out of every 10 babies born in the United States in 2007, a share that is increasing rapidly both here and abroad, according to government figures released Wednesday.

headline.main: Out-of-Wedlock Birthrates Are Soaring, U.S. Reports
headline.print_headline: Out-of-Wedlock Birthrates Are Soaring, U.S. Reports

docs.snippet: Unmarried mothers gave birth to 4 out of every 10 babies born in the United States in 2007, a share that is increasing rapidly both here and abroad, according to government figures released Wednesday.

docs.lead_paragraph: Tamiflu should be used in treatment even though the drug has not been approved for use during pregnancy, said officials with the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention.

headline.main: Drugs Urged for Swine Flu in Pregnancy
headline.print_headline: Drugs Urged for Swine Flu in Pregnancy

docs.snippet: Tamiflu should be used in treatment even though the drug has not been approved for use during pregnancy, said officials with the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention.

docs.lead_paragraph: Rape and coerced sex with young girls and teenagers is linked to a host of problems later in life, according to a new study.

docs.lead_paragraph: There is little that is cozy about “HomeBase IV,” a site-specific installation built around a dozen artists’ notions of home.
